enum lgTagTypes
 

values returned by lgTag::tagType( void )

Enumeration values:
noRangeType  a tag without a range
rangeType  a tag with a (...) range
endBracketType  a ")" tag
beginType  a tag
endType  a tag
remarkBegin  a (* tag
remarkEnd  a *) tag
